works.complaint:
This posting on a blog defames my company and my valuable trademark with  
intent to damage my corporate reputation.
   It is slanderous, untrue, and malicious and violates the Libel and  
Slanders Act of the Province of Ontario in which it is posted and held, in  
addition to similar Acts in provinces and States where it is readable..
   It is false and misleading.

  It violates Canadian and U.S. Trademark law by using the valuable  
trademark of SaunaRay Inc. protected in the United States and Canada, and  
slandering our company's claims of value.
    It violates Canadian libel laws by intentionally making false claims.   
The intention appears to be for sport. The result has been a recent  
potential loss of a multi million dollar sale of the company.
